io.spine.server.event

Class AbstractEventReactor

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.event.AbstractEventReactor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageDispatcher<EventClass,EventEnvelope>, MulticastDispatcher<EventClass,EventEnvelope>, EventDispatcher, EventReactor, EventReceiver, EventProducer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractStatefulReactor

    public abstract class AbstractEventReactor
extends java.lang.Object
implements EventReactor, EventDispatcher
    An abstract base for all classes that may produce events in response to other events.

    Events may be produced in response to both domestic and external events.

    To use one, do the following:

    1. Create an instance, specifying the event bus which receives emitted events.
    2. Register.
    See Also:
    reactors
